text: Hey, have you ever worked with Anna from HR? I've seen her a couple of times. Why do you ask? Well, I noticed that she's always in her office super early and leaves pretty late. Do you know why? Yeah, she's very committed. She seems to take her work very seriously. I don't really know much about her to be honest. What's her role? Anna is the head of HR and she has to make sure our company runs smoothly when it comes to HR. She doesn't have to interview for hiring people though. The rest of the HR team does the interviews. She's been with us for about eight years now. Wow, that's a long time. Is she a strict person? She's very easygoing actually. She's serious when it comes to work but also has a good sense of humor. She's fair and supportive, always willing to help and answer questions. She sounds like a great person. I should have a chat with her sometime.

dialogue.text: Hey, have you ever worked with Anna from HR?
I've seen her a couple of times.
Why do you ask?
Well, I noticed that she's always in her office super early and leaves pretty late.
Do you know why?
Yeah, she's very committed.

What's her role?

to HR.
She doesn't have to interview for hiring people though.
The rest of the HR team does the interviews.
She's been with us for about eight years now.
Wow, that's a long time.
Is she a strict person?
She's very easygoing actually.
She's serious when it comes to work but also has a good sense of humor.
She's fair and supportive, always willing to help and answer questions.
She sounds like a great person.
I should have a chat with her sometime.
